db:abstract.db:para: The QCocoaWindowFunctions class is an inline class containing miscellaneous functionality for NSWindow and NSView window specific functionality.

db:note.db:para: There is no binary compatibility guarantee for this class, meaning that an application using it is only guaranteed to work with the Qt version it was developed against.

db:section.db:title: QCocoaWindowFunctions::BottomLeftClippedByNSWindowOffset
db:section.db:para: This is the typedef for the function returned by QGuiApplication::platformFunction when passed clippedByNSWindowIdentifier.

db:section.db:title: [static] QPoint QCocoaWindowFunctions::bottomLeftClippedByNSWindowOffset(QWindow *window)
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function that can be used directly instead of resolving the function pointer. window will be relayed to the function retrieved by QGuiApplication

db:section.db:title: [static] const QByteArray QCocoaWindowFunctions::bottomLeftClippedByNSWindowOffsetIdentifier()
db:section.db:para: This function returnes the bytearray that can be used to query QGuiApplication::platformFunction to retrieve the BottomLeftClippedByNSWindowOffset function.
